thread.title: Who should win cleveland.com Person of the Year 2016 for Greater Cleveland? (poll)
thread.title_full: Who should win cleveland.com Person of the Year 2016 for Greater Cleveland? (poll)

author: Brenda Cain, cleveland.com
title: Who should win cleveland.com Person of the Year 2016 for Greater Cleveland? (poll)
text: We've introduced you to some amazing people in 2016. Now we are asking you to choose between them -- and a few at-large candidates -- to decide who should be Greater Cleveland's 2016 Person of the Year.
